title: Harpers Woodcuts - Opening of the 1890 Baseball Season
author: loubrown

posts.post_title: Harpers Woodcuts - Opening of the 1890 Baseball Season
posts.post_content:
Opening of the Baseball season of 1890 - Supplement.  2 separate full pages. Features 28 of the biggest players of the day including Anson, Kelly, Ewing, Clarkson, Brouthers, Ward, Keefe, Welsh, Glascock, Comiskey and Thompson.  
May 8, 1890. Includes the rosters of all of the teams.  $225  SOLD
